comment: The indexed union of a collection of ordinal numbers ` B ( x ) ` is ordinal. This proof is based on the proof of ~ ssorduni , but does not use it directly, since ~ ssorduni does not work when ` B ` is a proper class. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 3-Nov-2019.)
